title: SCP-7657 Art _ May Your Feelings Bloom
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:space]]

+ **A Comic for SCP-7657 _ May Your Feelings Bloom**
[[collapsible show="✦ 9 illustrations available. Click to proceed." hide="✦ The book is opened."]]

[[include component:image-block
|name=1.PNG
|caption=
> Today is a Sunday.
>  
> I decide to go outside after weeks of creative bankruptcy.
|width=80%
|align=center]]


[[include component:image-block
|name=2.PNG
|caption=
> Every time I meet eyes with a stranger, I see a description. I make out bullet points, character traits, hobbies, and hidden potential. The walls, the buildings, the crowd, they all blend into an untapped promise.
|width=80%
|align=center]]


[[include component:image-block
|name=3.PNG
|caption=
> My thoughts drown out in a sea of wasted ink.
|width=80%
|align=center]]


[[include component:image-block
|name=4.PNG
|caption=
> Maybe I should stop trying altogether. Writing is hard, anyway.
|width=80%
|align=center]]


[[include component:image-block
|name=5.PNG
|caption=
> I doubt it matters either way.
>   
> …
>    
> Maybe one more detour will do me good.
|width=80%
|align=center]]


[[include component:image-block
|name=6.PNG
|caption=
> "You'll be the best of the best. I just know it."
>   
> I mouth those words as I turn to my reflection on the water's surface.
|width=80%
|align=center]]


[[include component:image-block
|name=7.PNG
|caption=
> Step by step, word by word. A concept, a line, a paragraph or two. Clouds flee from above as my thoughts put themselves together.
|width=80%
|align=center]]


[[include component:image-block
|name=8.PNG
|caption=
> The gears are turning. The climax is just ahead. The ends of my lips rise as my pupils begin to glisten.
|width=80%
|align=center]]


[[include component:image-block
|name=9.PNG
|caption=
> Today is a Sunday.
>   
> I should go outside more.
|width=80%
|align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]

-----
    
[[collapsible show="✦ Look into the telescope?" hide="✦ You see lines of neat handwriting on the Moon's sandy surface."]]
> Someday, things tend to spiral downward. I would love to think about these "events" in life like traffic lights.
>    
> We know, we will face them while we are on the road. They can be red, or green, or yellow. Ninety percent that the lights won't turn out as we expected.
>    
> Although we might be a bit late, we will eventually reach our destinations. The premise is, we have to keep going after all of that.
[[/collapsible]]
